description: Ready in just three steps, serve up tasty grilled lobster cooked in lime butter with a side of mango salsa at your next barbecue.
name: Grilled Lobster With Lime Butter And Mango Salsa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 baguette, thinly sliced on the diagonal, toasted

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop half of the coriander. Place mango, chopped coriander and shallot in a small bowl. Season and stir to combine. Zest 1 lime, then cut both limes into wedges. Combine butter and zest in a small bowl.

Preheat barbecue plate on high. Place a tea towel over back of large, sharp knife, then place blade along middle of lobster and press down to cut in half lengthways. Brush cut sides with oil. Cook, cutside down, for 2 minutes or until lobster is just heated through. Turn over and spread cut sides with lime butter. Cook for 2 minutes or until butter has melted.
Transfer lobster to a large platter. Serve lobster with mango salsa, lime wedges, remaining coriander and bread.
